item.title: ~! Summoning help please !~
item.dc:creator: @_Pure_Pwnage ~!Pure Pwnage!~
item.description:
@_Pure_Pwnage wrote:

How do i make it so when you summon an npc it deletes the old one?

this is my code

case 162:
	if (playerLevel[16] <= 15);
        server.npcHandler.newSummonedNPC(2478, absX, absY-1, heightLevel, absX-1, absY-1, absX+1, absY-1, 1, server.npcHandler.GetNpcListHP(765), false, playerId);
        summonedNPCS++;
        actionTimer = 900;
	sendMessage("You can summon a pet every 15 minutes"); 
                PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " summoned a pet!");

Read full topic
